BasicCommands.fridgetheorem: The fridge theorem is a corollary of di's lemma, which states: if you own a refrigerator, and it's running, you'd better go catch it

connect.manual: Connect the bot to Twitch chat

automod.manual: Activate the automod using any of warn, strict or off, defaults to strict

autoprompt.manual: Sets autoprompter at an interval of [timer] seconds with optional message

say.manual: Make the bot say something in the chat

blacklist.manual: Blacklist manager, adds or removes keys from the blacklist, please note that it only consumes single words

CannedMessages.welcome: Welcome to the chat! I hope you enjoy your stay here :)
